subm_id.description: Unique identifier assigned by GLIMS to a specific data submission. Allows to obtain information about the analysts and data submitters.

n_outlines.description: Number of outlines from this submission used in RGI 7.0.

area_km2.description: Total area of the outlines from this submission used in RGI 7.0.

anlys_time.description: Representative time the outline analysis was carried out.

release_dt.description: Date at which the submission was realeased on GLIMS.

proc_desc.description: Description of the processing done to create the glacier outlines.

chief_affl.description: Affiliation of the chief of the regional center or the person(s) who submitted the data.

rc_id.description: GLIMS ID for the regional center.
